means: 苏（昔日法国的一种铜币），无价值之物( sou的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: You could only get ten sous for them.
sentence.Network_cn: 你只需花上半个法朗就可以把它们搞到.

sentence.Network_en: He earns twenty sous a day at an attorney's by penning quibbles.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在一个律师家里写讼词,每天已能赚二十个苏了.

sentence.Network_en: Give me back my forty sous, if you please!
sentence.Network_cn: 请您把我的四十个苏还我!

PerfectNetExp.abs: marius recollected that he had but sixteen sous about him ., 马吕斯这才想起他身上只有十六个苏.
